data.name: IDS_AdaptationInstructions
data.value: Follow these steps to use the Adapt It program to translate the story into English:{0}{0}1) Switch to the Adapt It program using Alt+Tab keys{0}2) Select the '{1}' project and click the 'Next' button (if a file is already open in Adapt It, then choose the 'File' menu, 'Close Project' command and then the 'File' menu, 'Start Working' command first).{0}3) Select the '{2}.xls' document to open and press the 'Finished' button.{0}4) When you see this story in the adaptation window, then translate it into English.

data.name: IDS_AdaptationInstructionsContinue
data.value: {0}5) When you're finished, return to this window and click the 'Yes' button to re-import the translated English text back into the English fields.{0}{0}Have you finished translating the story to English and are ready to import it into the English fields?

data.name: IDS_AdaptItFileAlreadyExists
data.value: The Adapt It file for the project '{0}', story '{1}' already exists. If you want to delete that file and do the English translation of the story all over again, then click 'Yes'. If you just want to try to import the existing file again, choose 'No'. Otherwise, click 'Cancel' to stop this command.

data.name: IDS_Caption
data.value: "एक-कहानी" प्रोजैक्‍ट ऐडिटर

data.name: IDS_ChooseTheStoryCrafter
data.value: Choose the Story Crafter

data.name: IDS_EnterProjectName
data.value: Enter the name you want to give this project (e.g. the language name).

data.name: IDS_EnterStoryName
data.value: <नई कहानी का नाम यहीं टाइप करके 'ऐटर' बटन दबाओ>
data.comment: <type the name of a story to create and hit Enter>

data.name: IDS_EnterStoryToAdd
data.value: नई कहानी का नाम यहीं टाइप करके 'ऐटर' बटन दबाओ
data.comment: Enter the name of the story to add

data.name: IDS_ErrorInAdaptation
data.value: "The data from Adapt It doesn't appear to match what's in the story.{0}In verse number {2}, I was expecting \"{3}\", but got \"{4}\" instead.{0}If you've made changes in the story or the {1} back-translation, then you need to re-export the story or {1} back-translation to Adapt It,{0}re-process the file there, and then try to import again."

data.name: IDS_FileLockedMessage
data.value: The project file '{0}' is locked. Is it read-only? Or opened in some other program? Unlock it and try again. Or try to save it as a different name.

data.name: IDS_FromNatlLanguage
data.value: &From {0}

data.name: IDS_FromStoryForDiscourseCharting
data.value: &From {0} (for Discourse Charting)

data.name: IDS_IsThisStoryFromTheBible
data.value: क्‍या यह कहानी बाइबल से है?
data.comment: Is this a story from the Bible?

data.name: IDS_LanguageFields
data.value: {0} &language fields

data.name: IDS_LogInAsCrafter
data.value: You have to be logged in as a 'Crafter' to add stories. To login, click 'Project', 'Settings'

data.name: IDS_MainFrameTitle
data.value: OneStory Editor -- {0} Story Project

data.name: IDS_NationalBtOfStory
data.value: {0} back-translation of the story

data.name: IDS_NeedToReboot
data.value: Problem initializing Sword (the Net Bible viewer):{0}{0}{1}

data.name: IDS_OverwriteProject
data.value: You already have a project with the name, '{0}'. Do you want to delete the existing one?

data.name: IDS_PressF1ForInstructions
data.value: {0} निर्देश मिलने के लिए 'F1' बटन दबाओ

data.name: IDS_SaveChanges
data.value: क्‍या बंद करने से पहले सेव किया जाए?
data.comment: Would you like to save your changes before you exit?

data.name: IDS_Story
data.value: कहानी

data.name: IDS_StoryColon
data.value: कहानी:

data.name: IDS_StoryLanguageField
data.value: &{0} back-translation field

data.name: IDS_StoryText
data.value: {0} story text

data.name: IDS_UnableToContinue
data.value: Unable to continue! Cause: {0}

data.name: IDS_UnableToCopyText
data.value: Unable to copy text to the clipboard!{0}{0}{1}{0}{0}{2}

data.name: IDS_UnableToFindStoryAdd
data.value: '{0}' नामक कहानी नहीं है। क्‍या उस नाम की नई कहानी जोड़ दिया जाए?
data.comment: Unable to find the story '{0}'. Would you like to add a new story with that name?

data.name: IDS_UnableToImportProject
data.value: Unable to import the project '{1}'{0}{0}{2}{0}{0}Contact bob_eaton@sall.com for help

data.name: IDS_UnableToOpenMemberList
data.value: Unable to open the member list{0}{0}{1}{0}{0}Contact bob_eaton@sall.com for help

data.name: IDS_UnableToOpenProjectFile
data.value: Unable to open project '{1}'{0}{0}{2}{0}{0}{3}{0}{0}Send the project file along with the error message to bob_eaton@sall.com for help

data.name: IDS_UnableToSave
data.value: Unable to save the project file '{1}'{0}{0}{2}

data.name: IDS_AboutToStrandProject
data.value: '{1}' नाम का एक प्रजैक्ट दूसरे फ़ोल्‍डर में हो चुका है। अगर यह नया प्रोजैक्ट इसी नाम के साथ बनता है, तब दूसरा प्रोजैक्‍ट नहीं खोल पाएगा, जो '{2}' फ़ोल्‍डर में है।{0}{0}क्‍या आप नया प्रोजैक्ट फिर भी बनाना चाहते हैं?
data.comment: You already have a project with the name '{1}' that is in another location. If you create this new project with the same name, then you won't be able to access the earlier project that is located in the '{2}' folder.{0}{0}Do you want to continue creating the new project and lose the reference to the earlier project (it won't be deleted if you do)?

data.name: IDS_HaveToLogInToContinue
data.value: काम करने के लिए आपको लॉग-इन करना है। 'Project' मेनू, 'Settings' पर क्‍लिक करो और अपना नाम चुनकर 'लॉग-इन' बटन दबाओ।
data.comment: You have to log in to continue. Click 'Project', 'Settings' and choose or add your name.

data.name: IDS_ProjectFileCorrupted
data.value: The project file is corrupted. No 'StoryCrafterMemberID' record found. Send to bob_eaton@sall.com for help.

data.name: IDS_ProjectFileCorruptedNoCraftingInfo
data.value: The project file is corrupted. No 'CraftingInfo' record found. Send to bob_eaton@sall.com for help.

data.name: IDS_UnableToCreateProjectWithoutName
data.value: प्रोजैक्ट नाम के बिना नया प्रोजैक्ट नहीं बन सकता है!
data.comment: Unable to create a project without a project name!

data.name: IDS_TerminalTransitionMessage
data.value: अगर अगले स्‍टेट में जाएं, तो इसके बाद आप इस कहानी को तब तक नहीं बदल सकते हैं, जब तक {0} अपने काम इस पर पूरा नहीं किया। क्‍या आप पक्‍का हैं कि अगले स्‍टेट (अनिकि '{1}' स्‍टेट) में जाएँ?
data.comment: If you change to this next state, then you won't be able to edit the story until after the {0} has done his or her changes. Are you sure you want to change to the '{1}' state?
